name: Groid
description:
You crashed on a giant placeholder with a grappling hook and a gun. Your placeholding legs are broken so your only way of moving yourself is by using the grappling hook. Bet be aware placehold enemies are going to try and kill you.

Shoot grappling hook with RMB, hold RMB to reel in the grappling hook.

Shoot enemie(s) with LMB.

This game was made in 3 hours, dont judge me please ;-;
